table.name: vtiger_critere4d
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_critere4d` ( `critere4did` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `nom` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `categorie` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `origine` VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT NULL, `ordredetri` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `usage_debut` DATE DEFAULT NULL, `usage_fin` DATE DEFAULT NULL, `commentaire` TEXT DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`critere4did`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_critere4dcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_critere4dcf` ( `critere4did` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`critere4did`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
